doubleOptIn.subject: Welcome to IntelliZoom Panel
doubleOptIn.title:
Hi {{user.name}},
welcome to IntelliZoom Panel!
doubleOptIn.bodyCopy:
Please click on the button below to activate your account.
For security reasons this link will expire in 24 hours or once it's used.

reset.subject: Password reset request
reset.title: Forgot your password?
reset.bodyCopy:
It's ok, we all do from time to time. Just click on the button below to set a new password and that's it. If you didn't make this request, please ignore this email.
For security reasons this link will expire in 24 hours or once it's used.

studyInvitation.subject: There's a new study available for you!
studyInvitation.title:
Hey {{user.name}},
there's a new study available for you!
studyInvitation.bodyCopy: Are you ready to give your feedback and earn {{studyFee}}?

studyComplete.subject: Thanks for sharing your thoughts!
studyComplete.title: Thanks for sharing your thoughts!
studyComplete.bodyCopy:
We will review your participation in the study {{projectId}} asap.
If your participation is approved we will proceed to send you the payment within 21 business days. The incentive for this study is {{studyFee}}.

paymentSent.subject: Your payment has been sent
paymentSent.title:
Hey {{user.name}},
your payment has been sent!
paymentSent.bodyCopy:
We've sent {{studyFee}} via PayPal to the following email address:
{{user.email}}

This payment refers to the study: {{projectId}}

paymentConfirmation.subject: Your payment has arrived!
paymentConfirmation.title: Hey {{user.name}}, PayPal has just confirmed us that your payment has been received
paymentConfirmation.bodyCopy:
You should now have {{studyFee}} more in your PayPal account for:
{{user.email}}

This payment refers to the study: {{projectId}}

certificationApproved.subject: You did great in your practice study!
certificationApproved.title: Hey {{user.name}}, awesome job on your practice study!
certificationApproved.bodyCopyOne: We see that you can clearly articulate your thoughts and experience. You're exactly the kind of panelist we hoped for!
certificationApproved.bodyCopyTwo: You will now receive invitations to Think Out Loud and Card Sort studies as well. These type of studies are better paid generally ;)

certificationRejected.subject: Your practice study was not approved
certificationRejected.title: Hi {{user.name}}, the practice study that you sent us was not approved
certificationRejected.bodyCopyOne: We’re sorry to inform you that the practice study you submitted did not meet the quality requirements we demand for a Think Out Loud or Card Sort study.
certificationRejected.bodyCopyTwo: If you think this is a mistake or you would like a second shot, $t(px-emails:izPanel.emails.generic.inlineContact) and we'll be happy to reactivate the practice study for you.

generic.gotQuestions: If you have any further questions, please $t(px-emails:izPanel.emails.generic.inlineContact) or visit our $t(px-emails:izPanel.emails.generic.inlineHelp).

reEngagement.subject: New password request
reEngagement.title: New password request
reEngagement.bodyCopy:
Hey {{user.name}}!
Please click on the button below to set a new password for your account.
For security reasons this link will expire in 24 hours or once it's used.

termination.subject: Your account has been deleted
termination.title: Your IntelliZoom Panel account has been deleted
termination.bodyCopy:
Hello {{user.name}},

We have deleted your account and information from within our system. (This mail being the last communication you'll receive from us.)

If you did not request this, it may be due to a long period of inactivity or due to a misusage of our platform resulting in a violation of our $t(px-common:izPanel.common.termsLink).

If you think this is a mistake or would like further information, please $t(px-emails:izPanel.emails.generic.inlineContact) or visit our $t(px-emails:izPanel.emails.generic.inlineHelp).

practiceStudyComplete.subject: Thanks for taking the practice study!
practiceStudyComplete.title: Thanks for taking the practice study!
practiceStudyComplete.bodyCopy:
We will review your participation asap and send you an email with the results.
If your participation is approved you will start receiving invitations to Think Out Loud and Card Sort studies.
This type of studies are usually better paid ;)

paymentSent.note: Thank you for participating in the study {{projectId}}. Hope to see you again soon!
